title: spectating a game where everyone is disconnecting and reconnecting
body:
and its ranked.
so hilarious..

what the hell is going on.

i tried another game and they are working fine, BUT THIS GAME IS HACKED OR SOMETHING
edit: I tried spectating another game

replies.body: HAPPENED TO ME JUST NOW everyone dced all the time and it showed one guy in chat pausing and unpausing the game it literally paused he didnt do it though

Same thing happened to me last night when I popped on to play a ranked game. Everyone was getting disconnected and reconnected, they ended up winning as team fights would just freeze up..hoping I get a loss forgiven!

yeah oce servers are fucked right now
i just lost and a game because of it and the loss wasnt prevented
